segments.text: Have you ever climbed the mountain before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Never . But I have been looking forward to it for quite a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now your dream comes true . Do you know the altitude of the mountain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 2065 meters . Come on . Let us keep up the pace .
segments.speaker: S2
